segments.text: It's such a sweet family moment, but it's all going wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The mom looks content drying her plate, unaware of the trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water from the sink is quietly flooding everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She'll be heartbroken when she sees the damage later.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy reaching for cookies reminds me of innocent childhood joys.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that unstable stool makes me worry for his safety.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He might fall and get hurt, poor kid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so hopeful, hand outstretched for a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're just kids being kids, but the risks are too high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sunny window and garden seem to mock the indoor mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad for the whole scene unraveling like this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Wish I could warn them before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could turn a happy home into sorrow so quickly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookies in the jar look tempting, but not worth the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR
